item.description:
The back room of the Trident is no longer available for meet-ups so we'll be meeting in the regular part of the cafe. Look for an "H+" sign on the table.

The default plan is more interesting conversation over dinner/coffee. However, if any of you have a specific topic you'd like to discuss let me know and/or just bring it up.

Default location of Trident Cafe, 7:30 Jan 10th. Please post or email if this date/time or venue don't work for you.

T travelers: I recommend getting off at the Orange Line Back Bay stop and walking though the Copley Place and Prudential Center malls. If you need directions please email me.
item.name: The Boston Transhumanism January Meetup
